content: Hi All, I was trying to balance 10 things around the connectathon and did not get a chance to test with anyone. Anyone interested in testing with FHIRFLY can sign up at https://dev.fhirfly.io/. We are leveraging the Google FHIR API and Apigee and use Okta as Smart on FHIR. We also have USCore, and Davnci Formulary and Pdex APIs live. We would love to start testing with the group!
Which health plans are you working with?

We work with several plans, but don't disclose that information just yet Michele. We aren't here to sell FHIRFLY, just to make sure we have the best product for our customers, which we know comes from extensive testing with the likes of awesome app developers like you
Feel free to @ me if there are any conformance issues with the Google FHIR API.
